issue.title: Atlas v3 URDF has no collision models

content.raw:
John,

I cloned the drcsim default branch, updated to drcsim_3.0, updated to that decsim_3.0 stl branch, then built.  I still get our urdf's that are atlas_skeleton (missing head, and other links that are mentioned in joint but never defined as links).

I may temporarily try Steven's approach.
content.html:
John,

I cloned the drcsim default branch, updated to drcsim_3.0, updated to that decsim_3.0 stl branch, then built. I still get our urdf's that are atlas_skeleton (missing head, and other links that are mentioned in joint but never defined as links).

I may temporarily try Steven's approach.
